org.trianacode.gui.extensions

Interface TaskGraphExporterInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IwirExporter

    public interface TaskGraphExporterInterface
    Interface used to provide dynamic discovery of taskgraph/workflow export filters. These filters are added to the export dialog at run time.
    See Also:
    FileImportExportDecorator

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      void exportWorkflow(TaskGraph taskgraph, java.io.File file, boolean appendSuffix)
      Converts the taskgraph to the appropriate format and writes it to the user choosen file.
